/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye towards the horizon.
